channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Chat App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Chat App

item.title: CVE-2024-2837|2024-08-01T19:25:42.125Z -- unknown -- wp%20chat%20app
item.description: The WP Chat App WordPress plugin before 3.6.4 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admins to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
